summary: Removes annoying ambient and wind sounds in dungeons, caves, etc.
descriptionHtml:
Getting tired of hearing those annoying looping ambient and wind noises in the background in dungeons and caves? This mod removes those pesky acoustic sounds and makes the dungeons peacefully quiet while the only sounds you hear are wood creaks, rodents, water drips, etc. This gives the dungeons a creepy and scary gameplay experience, especially when combined with the Sounds of Skyrim mod and with the background music off. This is my first mod. I tested it and it works.

This mod is also available in the Steam Workshop.
author: banzaigtv
